pages.title: Using Reagents
pages.text: Using Mermaids Gems as a Base instead of Blaze Powder results in a much more reactive potion. Not only does this allow you to add your new range of additional magical ingredients to your Potions, but also use some of them as additional Reagent. Each of those Reagents modifies the resulting properties of your Potions. Each Reagent can only be used once per recipe.

pages.title: Redstone
pages.text: Doubles Duration

pages.title: Glowstone
pages.text: Flat increase in Potency

pages.title: Gunpowder
pages.text: Creates Splash Potions

pages.title: Dragon's Breath
pages.text: Creates Lingering Potions - also requires Gunpowder as reagent$(br2)Allows you to create Tipped Arrows, if you supply Arrows instead of Bottles

pages.title: Topaz
pages.text: Makes Effects not show any particles

pages.title: Amethyst
pages.text: Adds a short flat bonus to the Potions Duration

pages.title: Citrine
pages.text: Slight multiplicative Potency bonus

pages.title: Onyx
pages.text: Adds a very weird taste and smell to the potion, making it unidentifiable.$(br)Also makes its color completely black.

pages.title: Moonstone
pages.text: Changes all otherwise negative Effects to their positive ones

pages.title: Shimmerstone
pages.text: Tiny multiplicative bonus to both Duration and Potency

pages.title: Quitoxic Powder
pages.text: Greatly increases Potency of all negative Effects

pages.title: Stratine
pages.text: Big flat bonus to Potency, at the cost of adding a random negative Effect

pages.title: Paltaeria
pages.text: Adds a random positive Effect

pages.title: Stardust
pages.text: $(italic)Absorbs the last drops of what remains of your previous brew.$()$(br2)Small chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed previously

pages.title: Star Fragment
pages.text: $(italic)Similar to Stardust, but much more potent.$()$(br2)Guaranteed chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed previously, at slightly decreased Potency

pages.title: Storm Stone
pages.text: Increases the Potions Potency at the beginning, but wearing off fast over time

pages.title: Azurite
pages.text: Negates the duration penalty for Lingering Potions as well as for Tipped Arrows

pages.title: Four-Leaved Clover
pages.text: Provides a huge boost to a random stat

pages.title: Vegetal
pages.text: Doubles the potions Duration at the cost of Potency

pages.title: Neolith
pages.text: Increases Yield, allowing you to brew an additional potion

pages.title: Midnight Chip
pages.text: Increases Potency and adds 30 seconds to the Duration, but drastically lowers Yield

pages.title: Moonstruck Nectar
pages.text: Makes the Potion much more smooth, resulting in it being way faster to drink. Might come in handy when every second is crucial

pages.title: Bedrock Dust
pages.text: Doubles the Potions Potency, at the cost of Duration
